name: Mr. Jumpington
description: Mr. Jumpington is a jumping hero and an adventurer exploring caves and looking for golden coins. This is a game where you control him while jumping through different caves and your goal in every level is to collect all the coins. Your movement is jumping, jumping and only jumping. Move one square at a time and beware of enemies and traps. Explore all caves in all levels and make Mr. Jumpington a true adventurer!
